features: 100% leakproof: When the screw ring, nipple and cap are all secured, your baby bottle is completely mess-free and leakproof, even if it’s turned upside down or shaken

Superior relief: Say goodbye to the discomfort caused by colic with Tommee Tippee Advanced Anti-Colic bottles. 95% of babies experience fewer colic symptoms* providing superior performance for parents
Innovative technology: Our patented vented wand keeps air away from milk and baby, meaning less air in baby’s tummy and a proven reduction in colic symptoms

Comfortable feeding: Our nipples are made from soft silicone with a breast-like shape that flexes just like mom. This helps baby get the best latch while reducing air intake and keeping them content with every feed

New self-sterilizing: Our baby bottles can now be self-sterilized, killing viruses and 99.9% of bacteria***. Simply fill with 50ml of water, replace the nipple and cap and heat in the microwave for 3 minutes**
body.description: Inspired by moms and designed by experts, our Natural Start Anti-Colic Baby Bottle has an extra-wide neck and breast-like nipple to help your baby have the most natural bottle-feeding experience. Made from super soft silicone, the nipple is Closer to Nature because it has a special breast-like shape that encourages a natural latch and prevents nipple confusion when switching between bottle and breast. This works by mimicking the flex and movement of mom’s breast, allowing your baby to feed at a pace that feels comfortable and natural to them. It also features an anti-colic valve to prevent the symptoms of colic by ensuring your little one ingests more milk and less air. For added peace of mind, the Natural Start baby bottle is completely mess-free and leakproof when the screw ring, nipple and cap are all secured (even if it’s turned upside down or shaken). It’s also 100% BPA free so it’s safe for your baby. However, you choose to feed your baby - whether it’s breast milk, formula or a bit of both - our Natural Start Anti-Colic bottles are #1 for easily switching between bottle and breast*. *Based on an independent survey of 1,006 UK moms of 0-12m who have used bottles, Feb 2023.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This is no ordinary bottle. Tommee Tippee Advanced Anti-Colic baby bottles work a little differently from regular bottles to help combat colic while ensuring a comfortable feeding experience for you and your baby. It has a nipple that’s Closer to Nature because of its breast-like shape to help your baby have the most natural bottle-feeding experience.

Superior relief. Say goodbye to the discomfort caused by colic with Tommee Tippee Advanced Anti-Colic bottles. 95% of babies experience fewer colic symptoms* providing superior performance for parents. Innovative technology. Our patented vented wand keeps air away from milk and baby, meaning less air in baby’s tummy and a proven reduction in colic symptoms. Comfortable feeding. Our nipples are made from soft silicone with a breast-like shape that flexes just like mom. This helps baby get the best latch while reducing air intake and keeping them content with every feed.

New self-sterilizing. Our baby bottles can now be self-sterilized, kills viruses and 99.9% of bacteria***. Simply fill with 50ml of water, replace the nipple and cap and heat in the microwave for 3 minutes**. 100% leakproof. We offer different flow rates to keep up with your growing baby. Every baby is different but as a guide we suggest slow flow and vari flow for 0+months, medium flow for 3+ months and fast flow for 6+ months. Recommended by parents. However you choose to feed your baby - whether it’s breast milk, formula or a bit of both - our Advanced Anti-Colic bottles are #1 for helping to ease the discomfort of colic, gas and reflux††.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ignore Negative Reviews
reviews.reviewText: First of all, about the reviews with the nipple collapsing, milk leaking, and/or baby not getting anything: make sure the squeeze the valve before putting it inthe bottle to assure its open. Takes litterally a sec. Also, double check you screwed on the bottle top correctly, it can easily get off course and leak. Other than that, it's actually really easy to clean and put together! These bottles really saved my sleep. My son was born 5 weeks early and has tummy issues. First we had to get him on sensitive formula, but he was still squirming in gas pain and projectile spitting up. Me, my husband, and two year old never got any sleep.... My pediatrician suggested these and i noticed IMMEDIATE improvements! He sleeps and smiles now! No more crazy spit up, no more gas pain... So if your dealing with a baby who easily gets colickly or just has a sensitive tummy, these are your bottles. Get them.A/N: Also, don't shake the bottle if your mixing formula.. I measure and mix up formula in a separate pitcher and then pour them into the bottles. Reducing air bubbles makes a difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bottle, great flow, many parts
reviews.reviewText: The only downside to these great bottle is the multiple parts that enable the anti-colic features. Otherwise these bottles have great flow and prevent my son from getting gassy. There are many parts and the some of the tubes are narrow and require a small pipe brush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Breast Like Bottle
reviews.reviewText: My baby was strictly on demand breast the first 3 months of her life until I went make to work from maternity leave. I wish I would have introduced a bottle earlier to her and maybe I wouldn’t have had so many issues. I tried MULTIPLE bottles listed in the picture and more. She just would not latch to any of them.Then after long painful hours, a ton of tears from both of us, and multiple orders off Amazon we finally found a nipple she would latch to. This bottle has been a godsend. I’m not putting down the other bottles at all I read great reviews that’s why I tried and bought those. It’s just the fact that this one resembles the breast the most which was awesome.The bottle does not leak unless it is human error. There is a few extra pieces than “plain” bottles but completely worth it. I prefer to clean a little more knowing my baby is happy, healthy, fed, and feeling well.

reviews.reviewerName: Me gusta mucho este biberón, es el único que utilizo  pero con retina se flujo extremadamente lento ! Lo recomiendo mucho

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excelente para lactancia mixta o diferida
reviews.reviewText: Me gusta mucho este biberón es el único que utilizo pero con tetina extremadamente lente

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just want to give my 2 cents.
reviews.reviewText: Among the bottles I have are the mam, dr brown, Phillips avent, Phillips avent anti colic, and this to me tippee.I wanted a bottle that would be big enough when the baby is older and yet still have the anti colic features for my new born.I also wanted to be able to access it with my giant dad hands when cleaning.And I wanted something that was affordable and easy to use.The tommee tippee consIt leaks if you assemble it incorrectly or try to leave any of the anti colic features off.The bottle cap doesn’t really stick down as much as I would like it to and can fall off.My hand doesn’t fit in the 9 ounce one to the bottom for cleaning.The star piece is easily lost and the bottle is trash without itMy wife hates washing themThere is always alittle milk that gets held up in the side that you have to shake around while trying not to wake up your baby to get into the nipple.The tommee tippee prosThey are lightweight and the heat up in the warmer fastThey have 9 ouncesThe nipple shape is the best for my babyThe anti colic device does work wellThey do not leak as long as you assemble them correctlyThey are affordable and a decent bottleOver all I rate this bottle a 4 out of 5 keep in mind I have not found a bottle worth giving 5 stars to they all have issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Invaluable in feeding breastmilk only, with flawless transition between bottle and breastfeeding; even daily!
reviews.reviewText: I have exclusively my son since birth. However, for the first few weeks, he had a hard time latching on (he was born a "tongue-sucker" and with an high palate) and took him a couple of weeks (and many lactation consults,assertive devices, and tears before success. while he ended a great nurser, I was warned by many "professionals and family against any bottle feedings. however, I had to return to woks seeks after birth, and only way I could give him breastmilk only was to pump and have my mother feed him from bottle several times a day. i purchased several different bottle brands, (Advent, and others advertised to avoid nipple confusion and mimics the breast; including "Tommee Tippee Closer to Nature" bottle, (Be careful package is labeled "Sensitive Tummy Bottle" with picture of tube and valve system, which is critical in reduction off air bubbles that can cause air bubbles in tummy, discomfort, and increased spit up. Additionally, it makes a "whistle" sound if improperly fed and valve turns red if temperature rises above 98°F. All these features resulted in the only bottle which reduced/eliminated extra air in tummy, decreased spit up, and was able to successfully alternate between bottle and breastfeeding. The bottle needs to be assembled exactly per instructions, which took a bit to master, but crucial for it to work. From six weeks old and continuing currently at 12 months old; they have held up, and he still successfully uses. The only negative but avoidable issue I found was the small, clear, wheel-shaped bottom piece of valve blends in with water when washing, is and I have lost a few. I have not found replacements to buy, so had to purchase of few extra bottles to replace it. Although frustrating at time- in the end was nice to have entire new bottles, which are affordable. The bottles themselves have a wide opening and any standard bottle brush works. The valves and nipples need to be cleaned with a specific narrow brush, (included with every bottle purchased), but entire bottle is simple to clean. If purchase a bottle warmer, make sure the width dimensions allow the bottle to fit inside. finally, I cannot stress how these bottles are HUGE factor in the success I had returning to work, transition daily feedings between bottle and without infant discomfort or refusal to feed either way!
